body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? Not sure. The application crashed, for no obvious reason. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.32 on Windows XP If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Can't attach - "quota exceeded". Will quote parts that appear relevant.

----- crash.log -------
2300. MagicExecuteFirstEventAction = 0
2301. MagicAddEventAction (EVENT: 1  Play a card or ability.) = 0
2302. MagicExecuteFirstEventAction = 0
2303. MagicAddEventAction (EVENT: 0  Play a card or ability.) = 0
2304. MagicExecuteFirstEventAction = 0
2305. MagicAddEventAction (EVENT: 1  Declare attackers.) = 0
Score = 2907

Exception from controller.runGame: no artificial choice result
java.lang.RuntimeException: no artificial choice result
	at magic.model.choice.MagicChoice.getArtificialChoiceResults(MagicChoice.java:90)
	at magic.model.event.MagicEvent.getArtificialChoiceResults(MagicEvent.java:343)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:66)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)

	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:48)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:48)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:48)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:48)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:48)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.runGame(ArtificialWorker.java:81)
	at magic.ai.ArtificialWorker.evaluateGame(ArtificialWorker.java:115)
	at magic.ai.MMAB$1.run(MMAB.java:165)

------- game.log -------
MMAB index=1 life=21 phase=FirstMain time=53938 workers=2 main=5
* [1/1019/-3332 at 54] (pass)
  [1/31883/-3355 at 113] (Knight Exemplar)
  [0/1459/-3353 at 100] (Sword of Feast and Famine)
  [0/304/-3353 at 98] (Sword of Light and Shadow)
  [0/7398/-3343 at 110] (Knight of Meadowgrain)
  [0/21007/-3338 at 101] (Sigiled Paladin)
MMAB index=1 life=21 phase=DeclareAttackers time=6547 workers=2 main=4
  [1/630/-7935 at 59] ([Black Knight])
* [1/4905/-3007 at 82] ([])
MMAB index=1 life=21 phase=SecondMain time=4657 workers=2 main=4
* [1/304/-3332 at 45] (pass)
  [1/906/-3335 at 77] (Sword of Feast and Famine)
  [0/1109/-3335 at 76] (Sword of Light and Shadow)
  [0/2792/-3335 at 99] (Knight of Meadowgrain)
LOG (P): Igor may (yes) put a treasure counter on Legacy's Allure.
LOG (P): Igor may (yes) put a treasure counter on Legacy's Allure.
LOG (P): Tap Island. Tap Drowned Catacomb. Tap Island. Pay {1}{U}{B}. Play Shadowmage Infiltrator.
LOG (P): Put Shadowmage Infiltrator onto the battlefield.
MMAB index=1 life=21 phase=FirstMain time=2468 workers=2 main=3
* [1/660/-302 at 21] (pass)
  [1/1553/-341 at 70] (Knight Exemplar)
  [0/26/-496 at 54] (Sword of Feast and Famine)

  [0/231/-381 at 58] (Mirror Entity)
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: RuntimeException: no artificial choice result
content:
_From [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/) on December 24, 2012 07:15:50_

What steps will reproduce the problem? Not sure. The application crashed, for no obvious reason. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.32 on Windows XP If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Can't attach - "quota exceeded".
